David Bruce was born in Nineteen Seventy in Connecticut but his family moved to England and growing up there he fell in love with boats classical and folk music and these days his work often combined classical and folk element in fact

Europe PT we've been sharing how classical music not only helps us live bigger but feel better I mean I Know my life I can think of many times when I've turned to music to feel better um
But one story that actually really sticks out for me is selling from childhood which is one of those childhood moments that you remember I remember my entire family was on a little family vacation and we all gotten some huge family fight I have no idea what it was about but
The mood was that in our little vacation place known was talking everyone was just feeling down and blue and sad and I remember my dad turned on the radio and it was the Tchaikovsky six some of the great ...
Somewhat tragic piece of it is a sad peas and I remember saying to my dad like of all these as you want to listen to this summer feeling like this right now
And he said to me
You know you don't need to listen to happy music to put you in a good mood sometimes if you listen to sad music when you're feeling sad it actually ends up making you feel better
And that was the first time that concept had ever been introduced in so I remember that I must have been maybe you know nine years old but it really stuck out [noise]
